title: Platypus Man
creator_credit: Kate Kennedy White, Mike Piper and Film Australia
brief_description: John Wamsley and Proo Geddes talk about their work at Warrawong and Yookamurra wildlife sanctuaries, which provide shelter for animals native to the Adelaide Hills, including platypus, from the predations of feral cats and foxes.
creator_credit_for_label: Kate Kennedy White, Mike Piper and Film Australia
